resources.string: Trello is the free, flexible and visual way to organize anything with anyone
Use boards to organize information and tasks, and see what\'s getting done
Oh And hey! This is Taco, our spokes Husky. You\'ll see him around
You can automate your workflow, connect Trello to many other apps and create powerful integrations.
So, what are you waiting for? Let\'s get started!\n\nDownload Trello Today!
